thread.title: China’s Stocks Drop for Second Day Before Economic Growth Data
thread.title_full: China’s Stocks Drop for Second Day Before Economic Growth Data - Bloomberg Business

author: Kyoungwha Kim
title: China’s Stocks Drop for Second Day Before Economic Growth Data
text:
China’s benchmark stock index dropped for a second day before a slew of data including economic growth and industrial production.
The Shanghai Composite Index slid 1 percent to 3,888.34 at 9:33 a.m., extending Tuesday’s 1.1 percent retreat. More than three stocks declined for each that rose on the gauge. The economy probably expanded 6.8 percent in the second quarter from a year ago, slowing from 7 percent in the first three months, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists. The data are scheduled for 10 a.m. local time.
